title: Jacket
description: black pounded indigo; front plain except for narrow embroidery; green and pink neckband and white tape accents at bottom; back has 4\"-5\" scalloped embroidered floral and geometric yoke piece; center back strip and bottom edge with corner triangles; all embroidered separately and attached; same technique applied to back of sleeves with two pieces wrapping around to front; green, red and blue with gold trim and sequins; fastened in front with string ties
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
